name: Game of Life (itch) (deadblit)
description:
A simple implementation of Conway's Game of Life.

You can toggle cells or heatmap view pressing A (or Z in the keyboard). The simulation speed can be changed pressing B (or X in the keyboard), ranging from stopped to 6 iterations per second.

This is my first attempt at TIC-80 and Lua, please leave a comment if you found any issues or has ideas on how to make it better.
